Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Hero
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class to describe an Entity with a name, maximum HP, HP, and is able to attack, as well as take damage
Author:
Nathan Taylor, Destin Byrd

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Entity​(java.lang.String n, int mHp)
    Constructor to assign values to name and maxHp and to set current HP to maxHP

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract java.lang.String attack​(Entity e)
    Used to deal a certain amount of damage to another entity and describes the type of damage
    int getHP()
    Gets the current HP this entity holds
    int getMaxHP()
    Gets the maximum HP this entity is allowed
    java.lang.String getName()
    Gets the name of the this entity
    void heal​(int h)
    Adds to the entity's HP without going over the entity's max HP
    void takeDamage​(int h)
    Decreases the entity's HP a certain amount without letting HP go below 0
    java.lang.String toString()
    Used to get the name and HP of this entity

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(java.lang.String n, int mHp)
      Constructor to assign values to name and maxHp and to set current HP to maxHP
      Parameters:
      n - Name to be assigned to this entity
      mHp - Integer value for the maximum HP of this entity

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public abstract java.lang.String attack​(Entity e)
      Used to deal a certain amount of damage to another entity and describes the type of damage
      Parameters:
      e - The entity to be receiving the damage
      Returns:
      String detailing the attacker, entity being attacked, and the amount of damage

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the this entity
      Returns:
      Name of this entity

    • getHP

      public int getHP()
      Gets the current HP this entity holds
      Returns:
      Current HP of this entity

    • getMaxHP

      public int getMaxHP()
      Gets the maximum HP this entity is allowed
      Returns:
      The maximum HP of this entity

    • heal

      public void heal​(int h)
      Adds to the entity's HP without going over the entity's max HP
      Parameters:
      h - Amount of points to be healed. If the entity's HP + h is greater than or equal to the max HP, the entity's HP is set to the max HP

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int h)
      Decreases the entity's HP a certain amount without letting HP go below 0
      Parameters:
      h - Amount to be decreased from the entity's HP

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Used to get the name and HP of this entity
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The name and HP of this entity on two separate lines
